modName: Helm of Yngol Clipping Fix for Women
summary: A mod that aims to fix the clipping issues with the Helm of Yngol.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod that I made for myself so that my character could wear the Helm of Yngol without her hair clipping through the back of it. However, I thought that it would be nice to share.

There\'s still a [i]slight[/i] clipping issue on the sides, but it\'s much less noticeable than it was before.

Please don\'t ask if I can fix the slight clipping issue that remains -- I can\'t. That would involve editing the mesh, and I have no knowledge of how to do that. This is a simple mesh swap mod.
author: Emerj
